name: Car Engine
description: We have imported this engine from abroad after physical inspection & quality check.We offer 6 months service warranty and attractive price discount in exchange of used engines.We provide full installation and servicing of car engines at our shop also if you need we can send car engine by courier at your place withour trained mechanics who will perform the installation.

name: Wheels
description: The most basic and important partsof a car body that have always been in use are the wheels. These are circularforms that generate rotary motion and are responsible for moving the car from one point to another.

name: Hubcap
description: It is a decorative disc on an automobile wheel that covers the central part of the wheel. The function of the hubcap is to cover wheel hub and wheel fasteners to reduce the dirt and moisture collection.It also enhances the overall structure of the wheel.

name: Crash Guards or Bullbars
description: The crash guards are mounted to the front frame or chassis of the car. This is mostly seen in SUVs to protect them from damage in case of an accident. These are the essential car body parts that play a key role to keep the vehicle moving after a collision.

name: Head Lights
description: These headlights are attached to the front end of the vehicle. They allow the driver to see the roadway in the dark, while also indicating to other drivers that a car is present. There are types of lights used in cars and each has its own function.

name: Radiator
description: The radiator sits right behind your car’s front grille. It is located at the center of the vehicle’s cooling system that monitors and regulates the temperature of the engine and prevents it from overheating.
